column6: Guess what? That ain't Peter Parker!! But it is Peter's worst nightmare. Someone has taken Peter's place in the world, his likeness, his everything, and he is-well-he is doing some damage! You won't believe the mayhem that goes down in this issue! Join superstars BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS (SIEGE, AVENGERS) and DAVID LAFUENTE (X-MEN, PATSY WALKER) as Peter battles the ultimate threat! Rated T  ...$3.99
